summary: Provides the Home Assistant integration for the INSTEON PowerLinc Modem, managing configuration, registering services, and defining a common entity base for INSTEON devices. Includes helpers for the All‑Link database, device linking/unlinking, X10 command handling, and a read‑only product catalog for device lookup.
business_intent: Allow Home Assistant users to control and monitor INSTEON devices through the PowerLinc Modem, facilitating device discovery, linking, command execution, and status reporting within the home automation platform.
